Lebowski.ISynchronizationSession

Lebowski.ISynchronizationSession Interface Reference

Describes the part of the state of a synchronization session that is relevant for a synchronization algorithm to perform its task. More...

Properties

TextModel.ITextContext Context [get]
 The text context at the current site.
string FileName [get, set]
 The file name that is associated with the session at the current site (if any).
SessionStates State [get, set]
 The state this session currently is in.
ISynchronizationStrategy SynchronizationStrategy [get]
 The synchronization that is used to keep the session in a consistent state at all sites at all times.

Detailed Description

Describes the part of the state of a synchronization session that is relevant for a synchronization algorithm to perform its task.
